#summary Golf Markup Language Documentation: simpleType AltitudeModeEnum.

== Name ==

*[SAltitudeModeEnum AltitudeModeEnum]*

  	

===  Super Types ===
{{{
string
  |
  +--AltitudeModeEnum (restriction)
}}}
----
    

===  Documentation ===
        
				KML/Google Earth "altitude mode".
				See also: http://code.google.com/intl/en/apis/kml/documentation/altitudemode.html.
		
  	
===  Properties ===

  	This component is not nillable.
---- 	
        
===  Model ===

	('relativeToSeaFloor' | 'clampToSeaFloor' | 'relativeToGround' | 'clampToGround' | 'absolute')

----
    

===  Local Usage ===

    	[CAltitude Altitude]
----
    <xs:simpleType name="AltitudeModeEnum">  <xs:restriction base="xs:string">    <xs:enumeration value="relativeToSeaFloor"/>    <xs:enumeration value="clampToSeaFloor"/>    <xs:enumeration value="relativeToGround"/>    <xs:enumeration value="clampToGround"/>    <xs:enumeration value="absolute"/>  </xs:restriction></xs:simpleType>
----
